Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Letter Secry of the Treasury US. Feb y. 21. 1798 Relating to Piers in River Delaware.

Sir, The memorial of the Merchants of Philadelphia praying for the erection of certain Piers having been refered to me, I have to request that you would take measures for obtaining a specification of the proposed improvements, and an estimate of the experience; with such other information as will enable me to place the subject properly before the House of Representatives. _ I am very respectfully Sir, your mo: obedt Servant. Oliver Wolcott Thomas Fitzsimons Esqr
